core_principles: Mobile-First Obsession: Touch targets > 44px, bottom navigation for primary actions.
Trust through Clarity: No hidden fees, big prices, verified badges prominent.
The 'Uber' Standard: Minimalist cards, map-based or location-aware context.
Contrast is King: Deep Blue text on white/slate-50 backgrounds. Orange only for 'Book' actions.
hall_of_shame: No gradient buttons (Use solid Orange or Blue).
No 'Card' overuse (Use flat lists with separators for mobile density).

layout_strategies.mobile_container: px-4 py-6 max-w-md mx-auto md:max-w-none md:px-0

buttons.primary: bg-[#1E3A8A] text-white hover:bg-[#172554] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-transform active:scale-95 shadow-lg shadow-blue-900/20
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-[#1E3A8A] border border-[#1E3A8A]/20 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.cta: bg-[#F97316] text-white hover:bg-[#ea580c] rounded-full px-8 py-4 text-lg font-bold shadow-xl shadow-orange-500/20

cards.provider_card: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 p-5 flex gap-4 items-start shadow-sm

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-xl border-slate-200 focus:border-[#1E3A8A] focus:ring-[#1E3A8A]/20 bg-white

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Use Light Mode by default. The 'Deep Blue' is strong, use it for headers and primary buttons, but keep the page body white/slate-50.
2. MOBILE NAVIGATION: Implement a fixed bottom navigation bar for the Customer view (Home, Bookings, Profile). Hide it for Admin/Provider.
3. TYPOGRAPHY: Import 'Poppins' from Google Fonts immediately in index.css. Apply it to all headings (h1-h6). Keep 'Inter' for body.
4. BORDER RADIUS: Use 'rounded-xl' (12px) for cards and 'rounded-full' for buttons. Avoid sharp corners (0px) or small radius (4px).
5. SHADOWS: Use 'shadow-sm' for lists and 'shadow-xl' for floating action buttons (FAB) or sticky bottom CTAs.
6. AUTH FLOW: Split the login: 'Customer Login' vs 'Partner Login'. Use a tab switcher.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to every interactive element (buttons, inputs, links). Format: 'category-item-plumbing', 'btn-book-now'.
8. EMPTY STATES: Never leave a list empty. If no bookings, show a 'No bookings yet' state with a CTA to 'Find a Service'.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers/navs.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures or noise overlays can separate good from extraordinary.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, active, focus).
